value.query: SELECT %vlocity_namespace%__Type__c, %vlocity_namespace%__ServiceEndDate__c, SUM(%vlocity_namespace%__Usage__c), MAX(Threshold__c) FROM %vlocity_namespace%__StatementLineItem__c WHERE %vlocity_namespace%__StatementId__c = '{{attrs.statementid}}'  AND (%vlocity_namespace%__Type__c = 'Data' OR %vlocity_namespace%__Type__c = 'Talk' OR %vlocity_namespace%__Type__c = 'Text') GROUP BY  %vlocity_namespace%__Type__c, %vlocity_namespace%__ServiceEndDate__c
